propertiesMeta.name: positionFeedback
propertiesMeta.description: The position feedback of the sunblind. (Default: ActlPos, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: positionCommand
propertiesMeta.description: The command to set the position of the sunblind. (Default: ActlPos, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: angleFeedback
propertiesMeta.description: The angle feedback of the sunblind. (Default: ActlAngl, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: angleCommand
propertiesMeta.description: The command to set the angle of the sunblind. (Default: LocInputAngl, DataType: Analog)

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the sunblind. (Default: sName, DataType: string)

propertiesMeta.name: cmdUp
propertiesMeta.description: The command to drive the sunblind up. (Default: bUp_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: cmdDown
propertiesMeta.description: The command to drive the sunblind down. (Default: bDown_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: fdbOpen
propertiesMeta.description: The feedback if the sunblind is opened. (Default: bOpened_Out, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: fdbClose
propertiesMeta.description: The feedback if the sunblind is closed. (Default: bClosed_Out, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: initialize
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true the sunblind will be initialized. (Default: bInitialize_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: operationState
propertiesMeta.description: Operation state of the sunblind. (Default: eOperationalState_Out, DataType: integer)

propertiesMeta.name: resetManual
propertiesMeta.description: Symbol to reset the sunblind into automatic mode. (Default: bResetManual_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: positionCmd
propertiesMeta.description: The command to set the position of the sunblind. (Default: fSunblindPosition_In, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: positionFdb
propertiesMeta.description: The position feedback of the sunblind. (Default: fSunblindPosition_Out, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: angleCmd
propertiesMeta.description: The command to set the angle of the sunblind. (Default: fSunblindAngle_In, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: angleFdb
propertiesMeta.description: The angle feedback of the sunblind. (Default: fSunblindAngle_Out, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: minAngle
propertiesMeta.description: The minium angle of the sunblind. (Default: fAnglLmtDwn, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: maxAngle
propertiesMeta.description: The maximum angle of the sunblind. (Default: fAnglLmtUp, DataType: number)
